participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Emily is passionate about teaching and helping others. She has a strong sense of community and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_1.background: I'm a woman. I work as a school teacher. I attend church every week. I enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. I have dogs.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Daniel loves music and has a great appreciation for the arts. He is sociable and enjoys engaging with his community.
participant_2.background: My father played violin professionally. I'm a piano teacher on the side. I enjoy exploring new parts of the city. I volunteer at the homeless shelter.
